/usr/local/cuda-12.2/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler    -G  -g  --maxrregcount=128 -g -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink --options-file CMakeFiles/Bingo.dir/deviceObjects1.rsp -o CMakeFiles/Bingo.dir/cmake_device_link.o --options-file CMakeFiles/Bingo.dir/deviceLinkLibs.rsp
